stack:stack.stack:script:
# get the mysql root password root_pw=$(awk -F "=" '/^password/ {print $2}' /root/.my.cnf | tr -d [:space:])
[DEFAULT] migration_table = _yoyo_migration batch_mode = off verbosity = 0 database = mysql://root:${root_pw}@/cluster?unix_socket=/var/run/mysql/mysql.sock
/opt/stack/bin/yoyo --config /root/.yoyo.ini --batch apply /opt/stack/share/migrations/stacki/
